text: The Galician Wikipedia (; also called Galipedia) is the Galician-language edition of Wikipedia. This edition started in March 2003. As of October 2015, it is the 45th largest edition of Wikipedia by number of articles.Wikimedia list of Wikipedias and their statistics.. Retrieved 25 October 2015. As of July 2013, it has over 103,000 articles.List of Wikipedias on Meta-Wiki. ==References== ==Other websites== *Galician Wikipedia main page Category:Wikipedias Category:Websites established in 2003
title: Galician Wikipedia
